p: EPL and valdecoxib (Sigma-Aldrich, Steinheim, Germany), Avicel PH 102 (FMC Corp., Philadelphia, PA, USA), nanometer-sized amorphous silicon dioxide (SiO2), Triacetin, olive oil, oleic acid, sesame oil, soybean oil, isopropyl myristate (IPM), and isopropyl propionate (IPP) (Sigma-Aldrich, Steinheim, Germany), Transcutol HP, Labrasol, and Labrafil (gift from Gattefosse SAS, Saint-Priest Cedex, France), Pharmaburst 500 (SPI Pharma, Inc. Wilmington, DE, USA), Poly ethylene glycol 400 (PEG 400), tween 40, tween 80, Kolliphor EL, and propylene glycol (PG) (Merck KGaA, Darmstadt, Germany), all other solvents are HPLC grade (Sigma-Aldrich, Steinheim, Germany).
